titles.title: TRICARE Treatment for Fetal Repair Improvement Act of 2016
A bill to require the Secretary of Defense to implement processes and procedures to provide expedited treatment of fetal anomalies under the TRICARE program.
TRICARE Treatment for Fetal Repair Improvement Act of 2016

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
TRICARE Treatment for Fetal Repair Improvement Act of 2016
This bill directs the Department of Defense to ensure that a covered beneficiary under the TRICARE program who is diagnosed with a fetal anomaly receives expedited evaluation and treatment from a qualified provider in the pediatric specialties of fetal medicine and surgery.
